title: why is the store so garbage
body:
many games have had stores for many years that have worked fine by this time i would think a game like league which is 1 the most played game in the world right now and 2 is f2p so is fully reliant on the store to make money 
why is it so crap
i get session expired even if i havent  been in the store sometimes even when ive just started the client 
over 1/2 a purchase wont go through 
it takes forever to load 
why havent they worked it out and why does it never seem to get better from patch to patch

replies.body: Apparently Riot are working on a new client, its taken them years to do it but you know, reasons....

Riot be like "We don't want to shutdown our servers for like a day so we will upgrade the client slowly over like 100 patches" wtf it would be so much better if they just shutdown for a bit and upgraded the client or if they just made an entirely new client and linked the download to the current ones news section. Upgrading a client bit by bit doesn't work if your game only updates monthly.
